channel.title: Sources; Pm me a very good source
channel.description: Please i have been looking for a good source and i cannot find one please recommend one to me.

item.title: Sources; Pm me a very good source
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

  1. You aren’t allowed to request.
  2. The Source doesn’t have to be good for you to make it good. A very good source can be made from anything. A very good source can be made from Shard Revolution, Hyperion Bases, Apollo (I doubt you’d be able to use it), RuneSource, and pretty much everything the other User contributed. If you use something like DeltaScape, be prepared to re-write a lot of existing content. A DeltaScape Base can be made “good”, provided you know what you’re doing.

Read full topic
item.source: Sources; Pm me a very good source

[/quote]
read why i derepped u[/quote]
XD holy hell…

@OP: Hyperion;Apollo;rs2dev;runesource/ all of these I recommend.
